functions.name: mod_quiz_get_attempt_access_information

attemptid.desc: attempt id, 0 for the user last attempt if exists

endtime.desc: When the attempt must be submitted (determined by rules).

isfinished.desc: Whether there is no way the user will ever be allowed to attempt.

ispreflightcheckrequired.desc:
whether a check is required before the user
                                                                    starts/continues his attempt.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Return access information for a given attempt in a quiz.

functions.name: mod_quiz_get_attempt_data

quiz.desc: Foreign key reference to the quiz that was attempted.

userid.desc: Foreign key reference to the user whose attempt this is.

attempt.desc: Sequentially numbers this students attempts at this quiz.

uniqueid.desc:
Foreign key reference to the question_usage that holds the
                                                    details of the the question_attempts that make up this quiz
                                                    attempt.

preview.desc: Whether is a preview attempt or not.

state.desc:
The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress',
                                                'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

timestart.desc: Time when the attempt was started.

timefinish.desc:
Time when the attempt was submitted.
                                                    0 if the attempt has not been submitted yet.

timecheckstate.desc:
Next time quiz cron should check attempt for
                                                        state changes.  NULL means never check.

gradednotificationsenttime.desc: Time when the student was notified that manual grading of their attempt was complete.

messages.desc:
access messages, will only be returned for users with mod/quiz:preview capability,
                    for other users this method will throw an exception if there are messages

content.desc: The question data. Some fields may not be returned depending on the quiz display settings.

page.desc: page of the quiz this question appears on

questionnumber.desc: The question number to display for this question, e.g. "7", "i" or "Custom-B)".

number.desc: DO NOT USE. Use questionnumber. Only retained for backwards compatibility.

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

sequencecheck.desc: the number of real steps in this attempt

lastactiontime.desc: the timestamp of the most recent step in this question attempt

hasautosavedstep.desc: whether this question attempt has autosaved data

flagged.desc: whether the question is flagged or not

state.desc:
the state where the question is in.
                    It will not be returned if the user cannot see it due to the quiz display correctness settings.

status.desc: current formatted state of the question

blockedbyprevious.desc: whether the question is blocked by the previous question

mark.desc:
the mark awarded.
                    It will be returned only if the user is allowed to see it.

maxmark.desc:
the maximum mark possible for this question attempt.
                    It will be returned only if the user is allowed to see it.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Returns information for the given attempt page for a quiz attempt in progress.

functions.name: mod_quiz_get_quiz_access_information

canattempt.desc: Whether the user can do the quiz or not.

canmanage.desc: Whether the user can edit the quiz settings or not.

canpreview.desc: Whether the user can preview the quiz or not.

canreviewmyattempts.desc:
Whether the users can review their previous attempts
                                                                or not.

canviewreports.desc: Whether the user can view the quiz reports or not.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Return access information for a given quiz.

functions.name: mod_quiz_get_quiz_feedback_for_grade

feedbacktext.desc: the comment that corresponds to this grade (empty for none)

feedbacktextformat.desc: feedbacktext format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Get the feedback text that should be show to a student who got the given grade in the given quiz.

functions.name: mod_quiz_get_quiz_required_qtypes

questiontypes.desc: list of question types used in the quiz

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Return the potential question types that would be required for a given quiz.

functions.name: mod_quiz_get_quizzes_by_courses

introformat.desc: intro format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN, or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.

timeopen.desc: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

timeclose.desc: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

timelimit.desc: The time limit for quiz attempts, in seconds.

overduehandling.desc:
The method used to handle overdue attempts.
                                                                    'autosubmit', 'graceperiod' or 'autoabandon'.

graceperiod.desc:
The amount of time (in seconds) after the time limit
                                                                runs out during which attempts can still be submitted,
                                                                if overduehandling is set to allow it.

preferredbehaviour.desc: The behaviour to ask questions to use.

canredoquestions.desc:
Allows students to redo any completed question
                                                                        within a quiz attempt.

attempts.desc: The maximum number of attempts a student is allowed.

attemptonlast.desc:
Whether subsequent attempts start from the answer
                                                                    to the previous attempt (1) or start blank (0).

grademethod.desc:
One of the values QUIZ_GRADEHIGHEST, QUIZ_GRADEAVERAGE,
                                                                    QUIZ_ATTEMPTFIRST or QUIZ_ATTEMPTLAST.

decimalpoints.desc:
Number of decimal points to use when displaying
                                                                    grades.

questiondecimalpoints.desc:
Number of decimal points to use when
                                                                            displaying question grades.
                                                                            (-1 means use decimalpoints.)

reviewattempt.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                    attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the
                                                                    \mod_quiz\question\display_options class. It is formed by ORing
                                                                    together the constants defined there.

reviewcorrectness.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                        attempts at various times.
                                                                        A bit field, like reviewattempt.

reviewmarks.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts
                                                                at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

reviewspecificfeedback.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their
                                                                            quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

reviewgeneralfeedback.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their
                                                                            quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

reviewrightanswer.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                        attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                        reviewattempt.

reviewoverallfeedback.desc:
Whether users are allowed to review their quiz
                                                                            attempts at various times. A bit field, like
                                                                            reviewattempt.

questionsperpage.desc:
How often to insert a page break when editing
                                                                        the quiz, or when shuffling the question order.

navmethod.desc:
Any constraints on how the user is allowed to navigate
                                                                around the quiz. Currently recognised values are
                                                                'free' and 'seq'.

shuffleanswers.desc:
Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled,
                                                                    in those question types that support it.

sumgrades.desc: The total of all the question instance maxmarks.

grade.desc:
The total that the quiz overall grade is scaled to be
                                                            out of.

timecreated.desc: The time when the quiz was added to the course.

password.desc:
A password that the student must enter before starting or
                                                                continuing a quiz attempt.

subnet.desc:
Used to restrict the IP addresses from which this quiz can
                                                            be attempted. The format is as requried by the address_in_subnet
                                                            function.

browsersecurity.desc:
Restriciton on the browser the student must
                                                                    use. E.g. 'securewindow'.

delay1.desc:
Delay that must be left between the first and second attempt,
                                                            in seconds.

delay2.desc:
Delay that must be left between the second and subsequent
                                                            attempt, in seconds.

showuserpicture.desc:
Option to show the user's picture during the
                                                                    attempt and on the review page.

showblocks.desc:
Whether blocks should be shown on the attempt.php and
                                                                review.php pages.

completionattemptsexhausted.desc:
Mark quiz complete when the student has
                                                                                exhausted the maximum number of attempts

allowofflineattempts.desc:
Whether to allow the quiz to be attempted
                                                                            offline in the mobile app

hasfeedback.desc: Whether the quiz has any non-blank feedback text

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description:
Returns a list of quizzes in a provided list of courses,
                            if no list is provided all quizzes that the user can view will be returned.
